Comprehensive Income: comprehensive income net of tax including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest

Derivatives and Hedging: other comprehensive income unrealized gain loss on derivatives arising during period before tax
Foreign Currency Translation: other comprehensive income foreign currency transaction and translation adjustment before tax period increase decrease
Other OCI: other comprehensive income defined benefit plans adjustment before tax period increase decrease
Total Other Comprehensive Income: other comprehensive income loss net of tax
Unrealized Gains/Losses on Securities: less change in fair value of impaired securities recognized in other comprehensive income
other comprehensive income unrealized holding gain loss on securities arising during period before tax

Other Equity Adjustments: cumulative effect period of adoption adjustment member

Exercise of Stock Options: stock issued during period value new issues
Stock-Based Compensation: adjustments to additional paid in capital sharebased compensation requisite service period recognition value

Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of preferred stock and preference stock
stock redeemed or called during period value
treasury stock value acquired cost method
__unmapped__: common and treasury stock issued during period value new issues
common stock dividends per share declared
minority interest decrease from distributions to noncontrolling interest holders
minority interest increase decrease net other changes
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
stock issued during period shares new issues
